page.title: 10A Headteacher's Day
page.content: He gets up at approx. 7.20am then gets shaved, washed and makes the bed. For breakfast he has toast, muesli, fresh orange and black coffee. At 8.15am he leaves for school. A typical day at school is hectic. People coming with four things at once and the telephone always ringing. At lunchtime he supervises dinners, has his own, helps in the school bookshop or sees people. He'll then have a five minute chat in the staffroom. He goes home between 4.15 and 5pm. Then he goes to his study to do some work. His wife likes cooking, so tea is very varied, although his favourite meal is egg and chips. He then watches The News till 6.30. The dogs are taken out until 7.30 then he'll return to his study. The rest of the evening is usually spent watching television or gardening. He goes to bed at 11.15pm.
